TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit Table/RowControlCollection extends System.Web.UI.ControlCollection

Docs.summary: Represents the collection of objects in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> collection is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table> control. Only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> objects can be added to this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Add(class System.Web.UI.Control child) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds the specified object to the collection.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection.Add%2A> method to add a new control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> collection. The specified control is added at the end of the array. The control can be only an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> control.
To add a control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> collection at a specific index location, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method.

Docs.exception: The object specified by is not a .

MemberSignature.Value: public override void AddAt (int index, System.Web.UI.Control child);

Docs.param: The location in the array at which to add the child control.
The object to add to the .
Docs.summary: Adds the specified object to the collection. The new control is added to the array at the specified index location.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method to add a new control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> collection at a specified location. The control can be only an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> control.
To add a control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection> at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection>, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table.RowControlCollection.Add%2A> method.

Docs.exception: The control does not allow child controls.
